gameplay.input

Class InputListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
      • gameplay.input.InputListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandIssuer, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class InputListener
extends java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
implements CommandIssuer
    InputListener listens to the keyboard and caches input and holds it until another system poll's the InputListener for the last command issued by the user. Implemented via the singleton pattern to allow access throughout the entire system. To implement speed, getCommand() only returns a command on every n-th call, calling increaseQuerySpeed() decreases the number of polls necessary to generate a new command.
    Author:
    MF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
